flawed_nl_solution:
There are 5-1=<<5-1=4>>4 more lions each month.
There will be 4*12=<<4*12=48>>48 more lions after 1 year.
There will be 100+48=<<100+48=149>>149 lions in Londolozi after 1 year.
#### 149

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 148, not 149. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
